name: Drop N' Swap 3D
description:
Use the powers of earth, fire, ice and wind to break through the maze of blocks. Each element has different physics (ice ball slides, wind ball phases through earth blocks, fire and earth ball bounces). Challenge yourself to beat the randomized levels for the longest survival time and most bricks broken.

How to play:
1. Tap left side of the screen to move left. Tap right side to move right.
2. Each tap swaps elements. Swap Order: Earth > Fire > Ice > Wind
3. Use opposite elements to win. Win Order: Fire > Ice, Earth > Wind
4. Avoid the sharp teeth at the top and bottom of the screen.
